firstDescription: The only solution to avoid the unbearable traffic jam is to send a bike! At affordable prices, save time and get to your destination on time.
secondDescription: Each of our rides is safe and covered by insurance services, which makes each of your rides with us much more secure.
thirdDescription: At dawn or late at night, our trained riders are ready to ensure your safe ride.

firstTitle: Choose the option of your choice
firstDescription: Budget tight? Use Send Car Light! Want to travel by AC car? Use send car plus.
secondDescription: Send Car Plus gives you the convenience of traveling in a comfortable and affordable AC car.
thirdDescription: With just a few clicks you can get your car ride very fast without any hassle.

firstDescription: Ordered food will be delivered in less than 1 hour! We guarantee food delivery in the shortest possible time.
secondDescription: Food is also available in more than 4000 restaurants in Dhaka and Chittagong. Choose your favorite restaurant and food item.
thirdDescription: Join us through a partnership with the restaurant to offer you incredible food combos at affordable prices!

firstDescription: Have you left your charger or key at home? Deliver items you need using Send Parcel.
secondDescription: Send parcels for your delivery of any kind of urgent documents as your trusted partner.
thirdDescription: The only solution for fastest parcel delivery in less time. Your needs are the most important thing to us.
